alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:34AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with brief torrential rainfall will impact portions of southern Windham, southern Tolland, northern Washington, northern Newport, Kent, southwestern Providence and south central Bristol Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 233 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lisbon, or over Jewett City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Brief torrential rainfall and dangerous cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor Street flooding. Locations impacted include... Warwick, Cranston, Coventry, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, North Kingstown, Windham, Bristol, Plainfield, Westerly, Portsmouth, Killingly, Burrillville, Tiverton, East Greenwich, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam and Brooklyn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
